item.title: Chatbot
item.description: Digest Provide a multi-domain chatbot that answers users’ transversal questions on every possible topics of users’ db access. Repos The main repo regroups a remote deploy backend 1.x a local deloy backend 2.x a frontend interface RASA framework implementation research The version rasa_2.x has still to be derived for a remote deploy. definitions rasa is the framework. It is comprised of two distinct parts: NLU which processes natural language understanding tasks to generate a language model, and Core which processes the expression.

item.title: Survival analysis
item.description: Digest Context The dataset comes from a clinical trial in the field of primary biliary cirrhosis (PBC) conducted at the Mayo Clinic between 1974 and 1984. Primary biliary cirrhosis is a fatal chronic liver disease. Dataset A total of 418 PBC patients were randomized to either a placebo or a drug called D-penicillamine. Each of them was followed until death or censoring (the duration is measured in days). The status at endpoint is coded as follows: 0/1/2 for censored, transplant and dead respectively.

item.title: Translator
item.description: Digest A humble code to request a translation model based on fairseq technology from Pytorch. Go to repo Sources & docs Pytorch’ fairseq model

item.title: Exercises generator
item.description: Digest Aims to generate 4 types of exercise based on video subtitles: “conjugation”, “fill the blanks”, “punctuations”, and “scramble”. Link Go to repo Sources & docs Spacy nltk

item.title: Questions classifier
item.description: Digest Script to classify Questions and Sentences. The goal is to detect if asked question corresponds to mapped sentence. Trained on SQuaD v1.1 dataset. Link Go to repo Sources & docs huggingface transformers SQuAD
